channel.title: How long have you been here?
channel.description:
Since when have you been in the RSC scene?
I was viewing the forums for a while before I registered, but my first account was "nemesis", not really sure about the date anymore since the account has been deleted, bet it was around 2004-2006.

item.title: How long have you been here?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“Outspoken, post:6, topic:405666”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=502542.msg3731171#msg3731171 date=1314640200]

Gz, you learnt to take a pic from years ago.

EDIT: I think I see your point now, Indeed I said that, but nothing proves I actually did it, because I didn’t DDoS you, just noticed it’s down and decided to fuck with you :), I’ve been harmless to the community unlike you.

“cause i’m only using 10 bots against your website”

you’re an idiot…

[quote author=-Nothing link=topic=502542.msg3730864#msg3730864 date=1314612781]but nothing proves that I actually did it[/quote], I only said that cuz an idiot believes whatever I say to him.
[/quote]

Well if you admit to it, what the hell is he suppose to believe?[/quote]
Dunno, it was fun tho.

Read full topic
item.source: How long have you been here?

item.title: How long have you been here?
item.dc:creator: @putaz putaz
item.description:
@putaz wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:18, topic:405549"][quote author=putaz link=topic=502542.msg3677427#msg3677427 date=1311332870]

No his account should be just nemesis as I believe I remember it.

2007-8ish myself
[/quote]Actually it’s funny because the IP address of the banned member and the IP address of this guy link to the exact same city… interesting

2008 here.

Well I hope I don’t get banned now, but yes that’s me, also ¤RSC[]Coder¤, Pan^Cakes etc. Don’t really remember why any of those are banned(Except -Nemesis, it was for threatening for DDoS(Which I never did but snoopy was retarded enough to report me)), I don’t think there even was a valid reason to be banned.

But still, my first account ever on these forums were ‘nemesis’, and it’s most likely deleted now since I can’t find on member list.

And by deleted I don’t mean banned, I remember when moparscape got hacked and all sections were wiped etc, maybe it’s been wiped along with that? Or maybe it’s just wiped for years of in-activity(Since I made new alias (¤RSC[]Coder¤) around 2 years after that.

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=152406
Around when using ¤RSC[]Coder¤ I had big ass internet ego, I thought I was like the one and only pro coder in RSC scene(Blame the hormones!), though I can say that I couldn’t code for shit, I’m lots better now, mostly because of studying actual java instead of trying to learn from RSCD(Really, lol).

Rule 4:
We only have one forum account per person, you can use the same account for Moparscape and Moparisthebest.

Yes snoopy, you have made like 5 accounts within a year and nobody has done anything about it, so I guess nobody cares
and unlike you I don’t have valid reason to be banned…I haven’t tried to infect people here continously,

Let me remind you.
snoopy89
ub3rpker
putaz
trencon(Or w/e u used at stork)

EDIT: and the accounts you used to try infect us with your 'SPOTTIFY PREMIOUMF".[/quote]

on topic:

January 06, 2008, 01:07:51 AM

Read full topic

item.title: How long have you been here?
item.dc:creator: @JUMPHIM JUMPHIM
item.description:
@JUMPHIM wrote:

[quote=“putaz, post:29, topic:405549”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=502542.msg3678335#msg3678335 date=1311369099]

Had to write that otherwise the mods would have thought I’m am snoopy.

The fact is that I’m snoopys IRL friend he tells me stuff about you guys…

You seriously thougt that we are going to believe that?

Let’s say you are who you say you are, okay you got the source from snoopy, you came here and made advertisement topic, I came and accused for being mario, here’s the best part: A Normal person would NOT have lied their name in the first place, and a normal person would NOT have continously tried to prove that you aren’t super-mario, a normal human-being would have left it there and continued with their life. Normal person would NOT have told us different name(which is obvious lie) at this point.

You just showed how much of an idiot you are.

EDIT:

Since when have you been in the RSC scene?

I was viewing the forums for a while before I registered, but my first account was “nemesis”, not really sure about the date anymore since the account has been deleted, bet it was around 2004-2006.

Date Registered: August 30, 2009, 12:26:18 PM

Not even close lolol

2007 for me. Sadly.

Just if you would’ve kindly read the other posts. I’ve said it several times that my first account was “nemesis”, -Nemesis is the account before this.
[/quote]

Who cares what my name is, do you want to marry me or?
That you even waste you time on this is a emberrasment. You’re actually wasting precious cutting time Finfag[/quote]
ok your snopp, how ya been dude?

Read full topic
